name: Season Simon
description:
How to Play - Use the Arrow Keys or WASD to move the player and the mouse to shoot

The seasons have blessed one cloud dude, Simon, with their powers, and the other cloud dudes don't like that. Use your seasonal powers to fight them off!

This is my first finished game! Made in around 8 hours for the weekly jam 273, with the theme of "seasons". My friend StarryPen helped fix a game breaking bug. Everything else is all me. Please give me advice.
